--afb700ukr.Cafb700ukr[fnAfb700Qpop3] QUERY02 BEGIN DECLARE @COMP_CODE NVARCHAR(08) , @PAY_DRAFT_NO NVARCHAR(20) , @PAY_YYMM NVARCHAR(06) , @SUPP_TYPE NVARCHAR(02) , @COST_POOL NVARCHAR(10) , @PERSON_GROUP NVARCHAR(10) , @AFFIL_CODE NVARCHAR(10) , @FR_DEPT_CODE NVARCHAR(08) , @FR_DEPT_NAME NVARCHAR(30) , @TO_DEPT_CODE NVARCHAR(08) , @TO_DEPT_NAME NVARCHAR(30) , @USER_ID NVARCHAR(100)

, A.DED_AMOUNT_I AS DED_AMOUNT_I_DUMMY , A.DED_AMOUNT_I_DUMMY AS DED_AMOUNT_I --필드가 수정 된것처럼 만들기 위한 DUMMY값 ..
, A.PAY_YYYYMM , A.SUPP_TYPE , @COST_POOL AS COST_POOL , @PERSON_GROUP AS PERSON_GROUP , @AFFIL_CODE AS AFFIL_CODE , @FR_DEPT_CODE AS FR_DEPT_CODE , @FR_DEPT_NAME AS FR_DEPT_NAME , @TO_DEPT_CODE AS TO_DEPT_CODE , @TO_DEPT_NAME AS TO_DEPT_NAME , @USER_ID AS INSERT_DB_USER , GETDATE() AS INSERT_DB_TIME , @USER_ID AS UPDATE_DB_USER , GETDATE() AS UPDATE_DB_TIME , 'N' AS UPDATE_MODE FROM (SELECT A.COMP_CODE AS COMP_CODE , A.PAY_YYYYMM AS PAY_YYYYMM , A.SUPP_TYPE AS SUPP_TYPE , B.DED_CODE AS DED_CODE
, SUM(B.DED_AMOUNT_I) AS DED_AMOUNT_I , 7777777 AS DED_AMOUNT_I_DUMMY --필드가 수정 된것처럼 만들기 위한 DUMMY값 ..
FROM HPA600T A WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN HPA400T B WITH (NOLOCK) ON B.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND B.PAY_YYYYMM = A.PAY_YYYYMM AND B.SUPP_TYPE = A.SUPP_TYPE AND B.PERSON_NUMB = A.PERSON_NUMB LEFT JOIN HUM100T C WITH (NOLOCK) ON C.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND C.PERSON_NUMB = A.PERSON_NUMB LEFT JOIN BSA100T M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON M1.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND M1.MAIN_CODE = 'H024' -- 사원구분 AND M1.SUB_CODE = C.EMPLOY_TYPE LEFT JOIN BSA100T M2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON M2.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND M2.MAIN_CODE = 'H173' -- 직렬코드 AND M2.SUB_CODE = C.AFFIL_CODE LEFT JOIN BSA100T M3 WITH (NOLOCK) ON M3.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND M3.MAIN_CODE = 'H181' -- 사원그룹 AND M3.SUB_CODE = M1.REF_CODE1 WHERE A.COMP_CODE = @COMP_CODE AND A.PAY_YYYYMM = @PAY_YYMM AND A.SUPP_TYPE = @SUPP_TYPE AND ((A.COST_KIND LIKE @COST_POOL + '%' AND @COST_POOL != '') OR (@COST_POOL = '')) AND ((M3.SUB_CODE LIKE @PERSON_GROUP + '%' AND @PERSON_GROUP != '') OR (@PERSON_GROUP = '')) AND ((M2.SUB_CODE LIKE @AFFIL_CODE + '%' AND @AFFIL_CODE != '') OR (@AFFIL_CODE = '')) AND ((A.DEPT_CODE >= @FR_DEPT_CODE AND @FR_DEPT_CODE != '') OR (@FR_DEPT_CODE = '')) AND ((A.DEPT_CODE <= @TO_DEPT_CODE AND @TO_DEPT_CODE != '') OR (@TO_DEPT_CODE = ''))
GROUP BY A.COMP_CODE, A.PAY_YYYYMM, A.SUPP_TYPE, B.DED_CODE ) A LEFT JOIN BSA100T B WITH (NOLOCK) ON B.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND B.MAIN_CODE = 'H034' -- 공제코드 AND B.SUB_CODE = A.DED_CODE ORDER BY B.REF_CODE2 END

--afb700ukr.Cafb700ukr[fnAfb700DelAPop3] Query02 BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON SET ARITHABORT ON
DECLARE @COMP_CODE NVARCHAR(08) , @PAY_DRAFT_NO NVARCHAR(20) , @UPDATE_DB_USER NVARCHAR(100) , @GWIF_TYPE NVARCHAR(01)
, @ERR_DESC NVARCHAR(4000)
-- [ 변수 값 할당 ] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SET @COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} SET @PAY_DRAFT_NO = #{PAY_DRAFT_NO} SET @UPDATE_DB_USER = #{S_USER_ID} SET @GWIF_TYPE = '1'
SET @ERR_DESC = N''
-- [ 날짜 포맷 유형 설정 ] ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- DECLARE @DateFormat NVARCHAR(10)
SELECT TOP 1 @DateFormat = M1.CODE_NAME FROM BSA100T M1 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE M1.COMP_CODE = @COMP_CODE AND M1.MAIN_CODE = N'B044' AND M1.REF_CODE1 = N'Y'
SET @DateFormat = ISNULL(@DateFormat, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
-- [ 그룹웨어 연동여부 설정 ] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- DECLARE @LinkedGW NVARCHAR(01)
SELECT TOP 1 @LinkedGW = M1.REF_CODE1 FROM BSA100T M1 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE M1.COMP_CODE = @COMP_CODE AND M1.MAIN_CODE = N'A169' AND M1.SUB_CODE = N'20'
SET @LinkedGW = ISNULL(@LinkedGW, 'N')
-- [ 등록된 수정자 설정 ] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- DECLARE @Amender NVARCHAR(10)
IF EXISTS ( SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM BSA100T M1 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = @COMP_CODE AND MAIN_CODE = N'A179' AND SUB_CODE = @UPDATE_DB_USER ) SET @Amender = 'Y' ELSE SET @Amender = 'N'
-- [ 지출결의 마감여부 체크 ] ------------------------------------------------ DECLARE @PayCloseFg NVARCHAR(01) , @CloseDate NVARCHAR(04)
SELECT @PayCloseFg = B.PAY_CLOSE_FG , @CloseDate = LEFT(A.SLIP_DATE, 4) FROM AFB700T A WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN AFB010T B WITH (NOLOCK) ON B.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND B.CLOSE_DATE = LEFT(A.SLIP_DATE, 4) WHERE A.COMP_CODE = @COMP_CODE AND A.PAY_DRAFT_NO = @PAY_DRAFT_NO
SET @PayCloseFg = ISNULL(@PayCloseFg, 'N')
IF ( @@ROWCOUNT = 0 ) BEGIN -- 기초등록-전표마감정보등록 메뉴에서 마감정보를 먼저 등록하십시오. SET @ERR_DESC = '54331;' GOTO ERROR_HANDLER END
IF ( @Amender = 'N' AND @PayCloseFg = 'Y' ) BEGIN --해당년도의 지출결의업무가 마감되었으므로 입력, 수정, 삭제가 불가합니다. SET @ERR_DESC = '55531;' + uniLITE.fnGetTxtLang('KOREAN', 'A0273') + ': ' + @CloseDate GOTO ERROR_HANDLER END
-- [ 결재상태 / 기표여부 조회] --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- DECLARE @Status NVARCHAR(10) , @ExDate NVARCHAR(10) , @ExNum NVARCHAR(07) , @PayDraftSeq NUMERIC(4, 0) , @TransSeq NUMERIC(5, 0)
SELECT @Status = CASE WHEN @LinkedGW = 'Y' THEN ISNULL(C.GW_STATUS, '0') ELSE A.STATUS END , @ExDate = REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(@DateFormat, 'YYYY', SUBSTRING(A.EX_DATE, 1, 4)) , 'MM' , SUBSTRING(A.EX_DATE, 5, 2)) , 'DD' , SUBSTRING(A.EX_DATE, 7, 2)) , @ExNum = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(7), ISNULL(A.EX_NUM, 0)) , @PayDraftSeq = ISNULL(B.SEQ, 0) , @TransSeq = ISNULL(B.TRANS_SEQ, 0) FROM AFB700T A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TOP 1 COMP_CODE, PAY_DRAFT_NO, SEQ, TRANS_SEQ FROM AFB710T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = @COMP_CODE AND PAY_DRAFT_NO = @PAY_DRAFT_NO AND ISNULL(TRANS_SEQ, 0) != 0 ) B ON B.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND B.PAY_DRAFT_NO = A.PAY_DRAFT_NO LEFT JOIN BSA100T M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON M1.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND M1.MAIN_CODE = N'S091' AND M1.SUB_CODE = A.COMP_CODE LEFT JOIN T_GWIF C WITH (NOLOCK) ON C.GWIF_ID = M1.REF_CODE1 + @GWIF_TYPE + A.PAY_DRAFT_NO WHERE A.COMP_CODE = @COMP_CODE AND A.PAY_DRAFT_NO = @PAY_DRAFT_NO
IF ( @@ROWCOUNT = 0 ) BEGIN -- 작업할 자료가 존재하지 않습니다. SET @ERR_DESC = '54361;' GOTO ERROR_HANDLER END
IF ( @Amender = 'N' AND @ExNum != 0 ) BEGIN -- 이미 전표처리된 자료입니다. SET @ERR_DESC = '54362;' + uniLITE.fnGetTxtLang('KOREAN', 'A0038') + ': ' + @ExDate + ',' + uniLITE.fnGetTxtLang('KOREAN', 'A0039') + ': ' + @ExNum + ',' GOTO ERROR_HANDLER END
IF ( @Amender = 'N' AND @Status != '0' ) BEGIN -- 전자결재가 진행중이므로 수정/삭제할 수 없습니다. SET @ERR_DESC = '90004;' GOTO ERROR_HANDLER END
IF ( @Status = '5' ) BEGIN -- 반려 처리된 자료이므로 수정/삭제할 수 없습니다. SET @ERR_DESC = '56304;' GOTO ERROR_HANDLER END
IF ( @TransSeq > 0 ) BEGIN -- 이체가 된 건은 수정하거나 삭제할 수 없습니다. SET @ERR_DESC = '56306;' + uniLITE.fnGetTxtLang('KOREAN', 'A0304') + ': ' + @PAY_DRAFT_NO + ',' + uniLITE.fnGetTxtLang('KOREAN', 'A0031') + ': ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR, @PayDraftSeq) + ',' + uniLITE.fnGetTxtLang('KOREAN', 'A0096') + ': ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR, @TransSeq) + ',' GOTO ERROR_HANDLER END
ERROR_HANDLER: SET NOCOUNT OFF SET ARITHABORT OFF
IF CHARINDEX(';', @ERR_DESC) > 0 SELECT SUBSTRING(@ERR_DESC, 1, CHARINDEX(';', @ERR_DESC) - 1) AS ERROR_CODE , SUBSTRING(@ERR_DESC, CHARINDEX(';', @ERR_DESC) + 1, LEN(@ERR_DESC)) AS ERROR_DESC ELSE SELECT TOP 1 '' ERROR_CODE, '' ERROR_DESC END
